sense.name: a journey or trip
sense.commentary: TRAVEL[+event][+journey] Note: focus is on destination, rather than mode of transportation
sense.examples: Bob's job as a sales representative involves a lot of travel. We enjoyed hearing about Mary's travels through southeast asia. She works in the travel industry. The spacecraft's travel to the moon took six days.

sense.name: a means or manner of transportation
sense.commentary: TRAVEL[+manner][+means][+of_transportation] Note: focus is on how something moves, rather than a destination
sense.examples: In the 18th century, travel by water was often easier and safer than travel by road. Many science fiction stories explore the concept of time travel. We are finding air travel increasingly stressful. The missile has sophisticated electronics on board to guide it's travel over the terrain.
